block.p: GLADSTONE-Hattie. On July 3, 2000. Widow of Harry. Beloved mother of Doris Berkman and husband Gerald, Yada Weinstein, Aaron Gladstone and wife Ann. Loving grandmother of Tina Wallace, Peter and Jay Berkman, Michael and Steven Gladstone. Also survived by nine great-grandchildren. Services Wednesday, 12:30PM, at Schwartz Bros-Jeffer Memorial Chapel, 114-03 Q ueens Blvd. at 76th Rd., Forest Hills.
